articles.description: Good Morning Britain weather presenter Alex Beresford was crowned winner of All Star Musicals on Sunday evening after performing a song from Hamilton
articles.content:
Alex Beresford beat former EastEnders star Jacqueline Jossa to win All Star Musicals on Sunday evening.
The 41-year-old weather presenter wowed the studio audience, as well as host John Barrowman, a… [+1971 chars]
